original_text: And he took the elders of the city, and he took thorns of the wilderness and briers and with them taught the men of Succoth a lesson.
korean_text: 그 성읍의 장로들을 붙잡아 들가시와 찔레로 숙곳 사람들을 징벌하고

sentences.original_text: And he took the elders of the city,
and he took thorns of the wilderness and briers
and with them taught the men of Succoth a lesson.
